about_the_game:
In this gloomy and mystifying first-person 2.5D horror survival game, help Sherlock Holmes chase down the murderous Count Dracula, who haunts the city of Rome every night, in order to kill and devour.
You wake up as Sherlock Holmes in a hospital in Rome. Walk around old buildings, rooms, and alleys; inspect objects, store them in your inventory to use them later; have dialogues with people; try to escape the malevolent creatures and ghosts that cross your path, and try to find Count Dracula to make sense of your strange surroundings. All that just so that you wake up back in the hospital where you started. And you can't help the feeling, that something is very wrong about this...

Filled with tension, occasional jump scares and pure horror, you will be less and less able to tell dream from reality, and get lost in this world of creepy hand-drawn 2D animations!

content_descriptors.notes: In this game, you will see a body dismembered occasionally. You will see a person with a horrified look, and blood and intestines flowing out their body. You will see a person being attacked and ripped apart by Dracula the monster. You will see Dracula drink and slurp the blood from people. These depictions will be animated in a Cartoon style, but can still be very disturbing. In one scene you will see a ghost figure throw themselves off a cliff.
